articles.description: Team India's middle-order batter Shreyas Iyer recently spoke about how he plans to adopt a positive approach for the upcoming home Test series against England.
articles.content:
Team India's middle-order batter Shreyas Iyer recently spoke about how he plans to adopt a positive approach for the upcoming home Test series against England.
